system.effect: The user places up to 3 segments of Ice Wall; each segment must be continuous with another segment, and at least one must be adjacent to the user. These Ice Walls count as Blocking Terrain and last until the end of the encounter or until they are destroyed. Each Ice Wall segment is 2 meters tall, 1 meter wide, and 2 centimeters thick. Each segment has 10 Hit Points, 5 Damage Reduction, and takes damage as if it was Ice-Type.
